overview: They may look Pink 'n' Pretty but when four horny housewives take a self defense class... watch out! First, Carol puts a hot head-lock on a well-endowed burglar. Then she and Alice pick up a stud-hitchhiker and use their face smothering holds on him! But the action doesn't stop here. After tigress Amber Lynn gets done servicing her boyfriend, housewife Betty sneaks in the room and uses her new aggressive skills on the willing dude! And when there isn't a guy around, these hellcats savor female flesh in a three-way tussle of lesbian lusciousness. Blam-O! These battling beauties do it all and more!
tagline: Looks Can Deceive When You're Pink 'N Pretty
title: Pink 'n Pretty
